data.title: Thomas M. Williams
data.meta_description: A Member of SKO’s Labor, Employment & Employee Benefits since 1995, Tom serves as Co-Chair of the Arbitration & Mediation practice.
data.text:
Tom serves as Co-Chair of the Arbitration & Mediation practice group and has been a long-time member of the firm’s employment law practice group with over 33 years of experience.

According to Chambers USA, Tom is “an extremely professional lawyer who treats each of his clients as if they’re number one.”

Mediation/Arbitration: Tom mediates employment and contract matters with a hands-on approach that supports resolution of claims. For this work, Tom has been recognized as a distinguished neutral. He also is an employment law panelist for the American Arbitration Association.

Employment Law Counseling: Tom helps employers handle difficult employment issues in a manner that meets their goals and minimizes the risks of litigation. He provides a quick and effective response to the most troubling employment situations. For this work, Tom was named the 2023 management side “Lawyer of the Year” for Louisville, Kentucky.
